name: Cybernetic Eye, Color Enhancement (TL-12)
description:
The color enhancement cybernetic eye resolves detail at long distances and detects camouflage. The color enhancement eye was originally developed to aid color-blind patients. Color hue and intensity are adjusted by increasing or decreasing eyeball pressure by squinting. This version of the cybernetic eye has a single-function and is easily recognizable as a mechanical implant.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.
